title: Gemma 3 270M: Compact model for hyper-efficient AI
author: meetpateltech
aiHeadline: Google's latest AI model is so efficient, it can probably solve world hunger while simultaneously figuring out why your Wi-Fi is acting up.

title: Steve Wozniak: Life to me was never about accomplishment, but about happiness
author: MilnerRoute
aiHeadline: Steve Wozniak, the guy who co-founded Apple, just revealed that life isn't about building empires or revolutionizing technology—it's about being happy. Who knew?

title: Meta accessed women's health data from Flo app without consent, says court
author: amarcheschi
aiHeadline: Meta, the company that invented privacy (just kidding, they actually invaded it), was caught accessing women's health data from the Flo app without consent. Because nothing says 'trust us with your data' like a blatant disregard for consent.

title: Why LLMs can't really build software
author: srid
aiHeadline: LLMs are great at writing articles, composing poetry, and maybe even convincing you that they're sentient. But building actual software? That's a task best left to humans—apparently.

title: Arch shares its wiki strategy with Debian
author: lemper
aiHeadline: In a shocking twist, Arch Linux has decided to share its wiki strategy with Debian. This is about as surprising as finding out your cat actually likes tuna.
